CurrentPositionOnRail: Defines current position of the mount point along the rail, in terms of normalized distance from the beginning of the rail.
bLockOrientationToRail: Determines whether the orientation of the mount should be in the direction of the rail.
bShowRailVisualization: Determines whether or not to show the rail mesh preview.
PreviewMeshScale: Determines the scale of the rail mesh preview
TransformComponent: Root component to give the whole actor a transform.
RailCameraMount: Component to define the attach point for cameras. Moves along the rail.
RailSplineComponent: Spline component to define the rail path.

methods.name: GetRailSplineComponent
methods.doc: Returns the spline component that defines the rail path
